title: Tenzies
description: Tenzies is a basic game made mainly with React JS. The user has to click in every die in order to get all dies equals. The project was made with some hooks, conditional rendering, vanilla JavaScript, CSS and some packages from npm.

title: YouTune 2.0
description: This project is a clone of YouTube. Made with React JS. It only display the same videos. It has some of the YouTube functionalities.

title: Json Place Holder API
description: An app that is conected to an external API to ask for data in JSON format. I use React with AXIOS library to conect with the API. I used aswnc-await functions.

title: Rick & Morty API
description: This is another project with APIs. I conected my app to the Ricky and Morty API. It display all of the characters in the home page. Then it use react-router to move to different cards with more specific data.
